head.title: Home - Dickenson County Public Schools

input.name: __VIEWSTATE

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

p.span:
Dickenson County Public Schools welcomes you to our district homepage.
Please check back often for current news and events.

br.br:
All K-12 public schools in Virginia will remain CLOSED for the 2019-2020 academic school year, per the orders of Governor Ralph Northam, in response to the continued spread of COVID-19.
We will share information with all stakeholders as we work with the Virginia Department of Education and the Virginia Department of Health by using our Phone All Call System, Facebook, and the DCPS website.

div.div: Registration has been postponed READ MORE... about 2020-2021 Pre-K Registration

div.div:
The mission of Dickenson County Public Schools is to provide a safe, nurturing environment to educate and inspire students to become lifelong learners and to encourage intellectual, social, and physical growth in a diverse and changing society.
​
